summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 11.2°C) and feels like temperature (down 10.8°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 372 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 272 m), and outside humidity (down 7%) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, the atmosphere will feel parched and dry and gentle light winds are expected. Showers, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and it’s dark. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
